page.description: Get the JSON array of objects for named range - if column names are not supplied, then the first row of the range is assumed to contain the column names.
page.prototype: GetNamedRangeJson as C(namedrange as C[, columnNames as C])
page.example: dim gs as helper::GoogleSheet gs.namedresource= "<namedresource>" gs.spreadsheet= "<spreadsheetid>" ? gs.GetNamedRangeJson("HISCORE","score") = [{"score" : 400}] ? gs.GetNamedRangeText("HISCORE") = 400
